title: Sidewall, 1920–50
creditline: Gift of The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology
description: Two repeating motifs. The first is a cherub or winged putto on a pedestal. This alternates with a collection of tools, including a trident and a plow or lattice.  These are seperated by scrolling and intertwined ribbons and carnations. Printed in pink, shades of gray, white and deep aqua on a light aqua ground.

participants.person_name: The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology

tombstone.epitaph:
Sidewall, 1920–50.
1920–50. Block-printed. Gift of The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology. 1998-75-78.
